Package com.epimorphics.lda.routing

The routine package contains the classes that map from URI paths to the endpoints that implement them.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Router Abstraction for the dispatch part of the API.
ServletUtils.GetInitParameter  
 

Class Summary
APIModelLoader  
Container  
DefaultRouter The default router is a wrapper around a MatchSearcher, qv.
DivertFilesFilter  
Loader This arranges for the current Api specifications to be loaded and registered with the router.
Match Represents the result of a router matching an incoming URL against its table of known endpoints.
MatchSearcher<T> A MatchSearcher maintains a collection of MatchTemplates.
MatchTemplate<T> A MatchTemplate is a compiled URI template that can match against a path and bind variables.
RouterFactory  
ServletUtils Some methods useful in the two servlet-handling components of the routing classes.
 

Package com.epimorphics.lda.routing Description

The routine package contains the classes that map from URI paths to the endpoints that implement them.
